name: TrashGame (hyi96)
description:
• Earth is being attacked! Trash monsters are spewing trash at you, and you must save the earth by killing it and vacuuming up all the trash!
  • You play as this little blue character, and your enemy is the green trash monster.
  • The monster spews trash from each of the four openings on the side, and bombs from the chimney on the top. You must disable each of the trash openings by shooting bullets into each one. 
  • When you vacuum trash, your energy bar goes up! You can use this energy bar to shoot bullets into the openings and to double jump. 
  • As the player, you walk with the arrow keys or WASD. You can vacuum the trash by pressing and holding the left mouse button. You shoot bullets by aiming with your mouse and pressing the F key or the space bar.
